channel.title: CVE Feed for Organic Themes -- GivingPress Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Organic Themes -- GivingPress Lite

item.title: CVE-2024-43352|2024-08-18T13:09:06.675Z -- organic%20themes -- givingpress%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Organic Themes GivingPress Lite allows Stored XSS.This issue affects GivingPress Lite: from n/a through 1.8.6.
